text: 'eykA<MUN>h | yA<SIL>S@bA<MUN>h bAdA<RBM>d hA`iyr<PAS> rab*A<MUN>tiy `A<ZQP>m hA<SIL>y@tA<TIP>h k*@'al@mAnA<ATN>h rab*A<MUN>tiy bag*w^oyi<RBM>m WArA<AZL>tiy<PAS> b*am*@diyn<ZQP>w^ot hA<SIL>y@tA<TIP>h lAma<SIL>s:

b*Ak<AZL>w^o tib@k*E<GER>h b*al*a<RBM>y@lAh w@dim@`AtAh*<PAS> `a<MUN>l lE<SIL>x<HSE>yA<ZQP>h* 'e<SIL>yn=lA<MER>h* m@naxe<TIP>m mik*Al='o<SIL>h<HPA>bE<ATN>yhA k*Al=re`E<AZL>yhA<PAS> b*A<MUN>g@dw* bA<ZQP>h* hA<MER>yw* lA<TIP>h* l@'o<SIL>y@bi<SIL>ym:

g*A<SIL>l@tA<AZL>h y@hw*dA<MEH>h me`o<AZL>niy<PAS> w*mero<MUN>b `<HPA>bodA<ZQP>h hi<YET>y' yA<SIL>S@bA<MUN>h bag*w^oyi<ZQP>m lo<MER>' mA<SIL>Y@'A<TIP>h mAn<ATN>w^oxa k*Al=ro<SIL>d@pE<MER>yhA hiW/*ׂiyg<TIP>w*hA b*e<MER>yn ham*@YAri<SIL>ym:

d*ar@ke<AZL>y Yiy*<GER>w^on '<HPA>bel<RBM>w^ot mib*@liy<PAS> b*A'e<MUN>y mw^o`e<ZQP>d k*Al=S@`ArE<AZL>yhA<PAS> S<SIL>w^omemi<ZQP>yn k*o<SIL>h<HPA>nE<TIP>yhA nE<SIL>'<HSE>nAxi<ATN>ym b*@t<SIL>w*lotE<MER>yhA n*w*g<TIP>w^ot w@hi<MER>y' mar=lA<SIL>h*:

hAy<AZL>w* YArE<MEH>yhA l@ro'S<PAS> 'o<SIL>y@bE<MUN>yhA SAl<ZQP>w* k*i<SIL>y=y@hwA<MER>h hw^ogA<TIP>h* `a<MUN>l rob=p*@SA`E<ATN>yhA `<SIL>w^olAlE<TEB>yhA hA<SIL>l@k<MER>w* S@bi<TIP>y lip@ney=YA<SIL>r:

way*eYe<MER>' mn bt= (mib*at=) Yiy*<TIP>w^on k*Al=h<HPA>dArA<ATN>h* hAy<MUN>w* WArE<RBM>yhA k*@'ay*Aliym<PAS> lo<SIL>'=mAY@'<MUN>w* mir@`E<ZQP>h way*e<SIL>l@k<MER>w* b@lo'=ko<TIP>xa lip@ne<MER>y rw^ode<SIL>p:

zA<SIL>k@rA<MUN>h y@r<SIL>w*SAla<RBM>im y@me<MEH>y `An@yAh*<PAS> w*m@rw*dE<ZQP>yhA k*o<YET>l ma<SIL>x<HPA>mudE<ZQP>yhA '<HPA>SE<MER>r hAy<TIP>w* mi<MUN>ymey qE<ATN>dEm b*in@po<DAR>l `am*A<MUN>h* b*@yad=YA<RBM>r w@'e<MEH>yn `w^ozer<PAS> lA<ZQP>h* rA'<MUN>w*hA YAri<ZQP>ym WA<SIL>x<HPA>q<TIP>w* `a<MER>l miS@b*at*E<SIL>hA:

xe<MEH>T@' xA<SIL>T@'Ah<PAS> y@r<MUN>w*SAla<ZQP>im `al=k*e<TIP>n l@niydA<MUN>h hAyA<ATN>tAh k*A<SIL>l=m@kab*@dE<MEH>yhA hiz*iyl<AZL>w*hA<PAS> k*i<SIL>y=rA'<MUN>w* `Er@wAtA<ZQP>h* g*am=hi<MER>y' nE<SIL>'En@xA<TIP>h wat*A<MER>SAb 'Ax<SIL>w^or:

Tum@'AtA<MUN>h* b*@Sw*lE<RBM>yhA lo<MEH>' zA<SIL>k@rAh<PAS> 'a<SIL>x<HPA>riytA<ZQP>h* wat*e<MUN>rEd p*@lA'i<ZQP>ym 'e<MER>yn m@naxe<TIP>m lA<ATN>h* r@'e<MEH>h y@hwAh<PAS> 'Et=`An@yi<ZQP>y k*i<MER>y hig@d*i<TIP>yl 'w^oye<SIL>b:

yAdw^o<PAS> p*A<MUN>raW YA<ZQP>r `a<TIP>l k*Al=ma<SIL>x<HPA>mad*E<ATN>yhA k*i<SIL>y=rA'<HPA>tA<MEH>h gw^oyim<PAS> b*A<MUN>'w* miq@d*ASA<ZQP>h* '<HPA>SE<MUN>r Yiw*i<ZQP>ytAh lo<SIL>'=yAbo<MER>'w* baq*AhA<TIP>l lA<SIL>k@:

k*Al=`am*A<MEH>h* nE<SIL>'<HSE>nAxiym<PAS> m@baq*@Si<MUN>ym lE<ZQP>xEm nA<SIL>t@n<DAR>w* mxmwdyhm (ma<SIL>x<HPA>mad*eyhE<TEB>m) b*@'o<TIP>kEl l@hASi<MUN>yb nA<ATN>pES r@'e<MEH>h y@hwAh<PAS> w@<SIL>hab*i<ZQP>yTAh k*i<MER>y hAyi<TIP>ytiy z<SIL>w^olelA<SIL>h:

l<MUN>w^o' '<HPA>leykEm<ZIN> k*Al=`o<MUN>b@rey dErEk@<AST> hab*i<MUN>yTw* w*r@'<ZQP>w* 'im=ye<MEH>S mak@'w^ob<PAS> k*@mak@'obi<ZQP>y '<HPA>SE<MER>r `w^ola<TIP>l li<ATN>y '<HPA>SEr<PAS> hw^ogA<MUN>h y@hwA<ZQP>h b*@y<TIP>w^om x<HPA>r<MER>w^on 'ap*<SIL>w^o:

mim*Ar<TEB>w^om SA<SIL>lax='e<MER>S b*@`aY@mota<TIP>y way*ir@d*E<ATN>n*Ah p*Ara<AZL>W rE<MEH>SEt l@rag@lay<PAS> h<HSE>Siyba<MUN>niy 'Ax<ZQP>w^or n@tAna<AZL>niy<PAS> So<SIL>memA<ZQP>h k*Al=hay*<TIP>w^om d*AwA<SIL>h:

niW@qad<TLP> `o<AZL>l p*@SA`a<GER>y b*@yAd<RBM>w^o yiW@t*A<MER>r@g<TEB>w* `Al<MER>w* `al=Yaw*A'ri<TIP>y hik@Si<MUN>yl k*oxi<ATN>y n@tAna<MUN>niy '<HPA>donA<ZQP>y b*iyde<TIP>y lo<SIL>'='w*ka<MER>l q<SIL>w*m:

sil*A<AZL>h kAl='ab*iyra<MEH>y | '<HPA>donAy<PAS> b*@qir@b*i<ZQP>y qArA<MER>' `Ala<TEB>y mw^o`e<TIP>d liS@b*o<MUN>r b*a<SIL>xw*rA<ATN>y g*a<YET>t d*Ara<MUN>k@ '<HPA>donA<ZQP>y lib@tw*la<TIP>t b*at=y@hw*dA<SIL>h:

`al='e<MUN>l*Eh | '<HPA>ni<MUN>y b<SIL>w^okiy*A<RBM>h `eyni<MEH>y | `eyniy<PAS> yo<MUN>r@dAh m*a<ZQP>yim k*i<SIL>y=rAxa<MER>q mim*E<TEB>n*iy m@naxe<TIP>m meSi<MUN>yb nap@Si<ATN>y hAy<MEH>w* bAnay<PAS> S<SIL>w^omemi<ZQP>ym k*i<MER>y gAba<TIP>r 'w^oye<SIL>b:

p*e<SIL>r@WA<AZL>h Yiy*<GER>w^on b*@yAdE<RBM>yhA 'e<MEH>yn m@naxem<PAS> lA<ZQP>h* Yiw*A<DAR>h y@hwA<TEB>h l@ya<SIL>`<HPA>qo<TIP>b s@biybA<MUN>yw YArA<ATN>yw hA<SIL>y@tA<DAR>h y@r<SIL>w*SAla<TEB>im l@nid*A<TIP>h b*e<SIL>yneyhE<SIL>m:

Yad*i<MER>yq h<TEB>w*' y@hwA<TIP>h k*i<MUN>y pi<MUN>yhw* mAri<ATN>ytiy Sim@`w*=nA<MUN>' kAl=`mym (hA<SIL>`am*i<RBM>ym) w*r@'w*<PAS> mak@'obi<ZQP>y b*@t<SIL>w*lota<MER>y w*ba<SIL>xw*ra<TIP>y hA<SIL>l@k<MER>w* baW/*.E<SIL>biy:

qArA<MEH>'tiy la<SIL>m@'ah<HPA>bay<PAS> he<MUN>m*Ah rim*<ZQP>w*niy k*o<SIL>h<HPA>na<MER>y w*z@qena<TIP>y b*A`i<MUN>yr g*AwA<ATN>`w* k*i<SIL>y=biq@S<MER>w* 'o<AZL>kEl<PAS> lA<ZQP>mw^o w@yASi<TIP>ybw* 'Et=nap@SA<SIL>m:

r@'e<AZL>h y@hwA<MEH>h k*i<SIL>y=Yar=liy<PAS> me`a<MUN>y x<HQA>mar@mA<ZQP>rw* nEh@p*a<MEH>k@ lib*iy<PAS> b*@qir@b*i<ZQP>y k*i<MER>y mAr<TIP>w^o mAri<ATN>ytiy mix<MER>w*Y Sik*@lAh=xE<TIP>rEb b*ab*a<MER>yit k*am*A<SIL>wEt:

SA<SIL>m@`<GAR>w* k*i<DAR>y nE<SIL>'<HSE>nAxA<MUN>h 'A<RBM>niy 'e<MEH>yn m@naxem<PAS> li<ZQP>y k*Al='o<AZL>y@ba<GER>y SA<SIL>m@`<MEH>w* rA<SIL>`Atiy<PAS> WA<ZQP>Ww* k*i<MER>y 'at*A<TIP>h `AWi<ATN>ytA hebe<MER>'tA yw^om=qArA<TIP>'tA w@yi<SIL>h@y<MER>w* kAmo<SIL>niy:

t*Abo<AZL>' kAl=rA<SIL>`AtA<MEH>m l@pAnE<AZL>ykA<PAS> w@`w^ole<MUN>l lA<ZQP>mw^o k*a<SIL>'<HPA>SE<MER>r `w^ola<TEB>l@t*A li<TIP>y `a<MUN>l k*Al=p*@SA`A<ATN>y k*i<SIL>y=rab*<MER>w^ot 'an@xota<TIP>y w@lib*i<MER>y daw*A<SIL>y:

'eykAh<TLP> yA`i<AZL>yb b*@'ap*<MEH>w^o | '<HPA>donAy<PAS> 'Et=b*at=Yiy*<ZQP>w^on hiS@li<MEH>yk@ miW/*.Ama<AZL>yim<PAS> 'E<ZQP>rEY t*ip@'E<TIP>rEt yiW@rA'e<ATN>l w@lo<SIL>'=zAka<MER>r h<HPA>dom=rag@lA<TIP>yw b*@y<MER>w^om 'ap*<SIL>w^o:

b*il*a<AZL>` '<HPA>donA<GER>y l' (w@lo<MUN>') xAma<RBM>l 'e<YET>t k*Al=n@'<MUN>w^ot ya<SIL>`<HPA>qo<ZQP>b hAra<DAR>s b*@`Eb@rAt<TEB>w^o mib@Y@re<MER>y bat=y@hw*dA<TIP>h hig*i<MUN>y`a lA'A<ATN>rEY xil*e<MER>l mam@lAkA<TIP>h w@WArE<SIL>yhA:

g*Ada<MUN>` b*A<SIL>x<HQA>riy='a<RBM>p k*o<YET>l qE<MUN>rEn yiW@rA'e<ZQP>l heSi<MER>yb 'Ax<TEB>w^or y@miyn<TIP>w^o mip*@ne<MUN>y 'w^oye<ATN>b way*ib@`a<MEH>r b*@ya<SIL>`<HPA>qob<PAS> k*@'e<MUN>S lE<SIL>hAbA<ZQP>h 'A<SIL>k@lA<TIP>h sAbi<SIL>yb:

d*Ara<AZL>k@ qaS@t*<GER>w^o k*@'w^oye<RBM>b niY*A<MEH>b y@miynw^o<PAS> k*@YA<ZQP>r wa<SIL>y*ah<HPA>ro<ZQP>g k*o<TIP>l ma<SIL>x<HPA>mad*ey=`A<ATN>yin b*@'o<AZL>hEl<PAS> b*at=Yiy*<ZQP>w^on SApa<MER>k@ k*A'e<TIP>S x<HPA>mAt<SIL>w^o:

hAyA<AZL>h '<HPA>donA<MEH>y | k*@'w^oyeb<PAS> b*il*a<MUN>` yiW@rA'e<ZQP>l b*il*a`<PAS> k*Al='ar@m@nw^otE<ZQP>yhA Sixe<TIP>t mib@YArA<ATN>yw way*E<AZL>rEb<PAS> b*@bat=y@hw*dA<ZQP>h t*a<SIL>'<HPA>niy*A<TIP>h wa<SIL>'<HPA>niy*A<SIL>h:

way*ax@mo<MEH>s k*ag*an<PAS> Wuk*<ZQP>w^o Sixe<TIP>t mo<SIL>`<HPA>d<ATN>w^o Sik*a<AZL>x y@hwA<MEH>h | b*@Yiy*w^on<PAS> mw^o`e<MUN>d w@Sab*A<ZQP>t way*in@'a<MER>Y b*@za<SIL>`am='ap*<TIP>w^o mE<MER>lEk@ w@kohe<SIL>n:

zAna<AZL>x '<HPA>donA<MEH>y | miz@b*@xw^o<PAS> ni'e<MUN>r miq@d*AS<ZQP>w^o his@g*iyr<PAS> b*@yad='w^oye<ZQP>b xw^omo<TIP>t 'ar@m@nw^otE<ATN>yhA q<TEB>w^ol nA<SIL>t@n<MER>w* b*@beyt=y@hwA<TIP>h k*@y<MER>w^om mw^o`e<SIL>d:

xASa<AZL>b y@hwA<MEH>h | l@haS@xiyt<PAS> xw^oma<MUN>t b*at=Yiy*<ZQP>w^on nA<MUN>TAh qA<ZQP>w lo<SIL>'=heSi<MER>yb yAd<TIP>w^o mib*al*e<ATN>`a way*a<SIL>'<HPA>bEl=xe<MER>l w@xw^omA<TIP>h yax@d*A<MER>w 'um@lA<SIL>lw*:

TA<SIL>b@`<MEH>w* bA'A<AZL>rEY<PAS> S@`ArE<ZQP>yhA 'ib*a<MER>d w@Sib*a<TIP>r b*@riyxE<ATN>yhA mal@k*A<AZL>h* w@WArE<MEH>yhA bag*w^oyim<PAS> 'e<MUN>yn t*w^orA<ZQP>h g*am=n@biy'E<ZQM>yhA lo<SIL>'=mAY@'<MER>w* xAz<TIP>w^on me<SIL>y@hwA<SIL>h:

ye<SIL>S@b<AZL>w* lA'A<MEH>rEY yid*@mw*<PAS> ziq@ne<MUN>y bat=Yiy*<ZQP>w^on hE<SIL>`<HSE>l<MEH>w* `ApAr<PAS> `al=ro'SA<ZQP>m xA<SIL>g@r<TIP>w* Waq*i<ATN>ym hw^ori<MEH>ydw* lA'A<AZL>rEY<PAS> ro'SA<ZQP>n b*@tw*lo<TIP>t y@r<SIL>w*SAlA<SIL>im:

k*Al<AZL>w* bad*@mA`<MEH>w^ot `eynay<PAS> x<HQA>mar@m@r<MUN>w* me`a<ZQP>y niS@p*a<MEH>k@ lA'A<AZL>rEY<PAS> k*@bedi<ZQP>y `al=SE<TIP>bEr b*at=`am*i<ATN>y b*e<SIL>`ATe<MEH>p `w^olel<PAS> w@yw^one<ZQP>q b*ir@xob<TIP>w^ot qir@yA<SIL>h:

l@'im*otAm<PAS> yo<SIL>'m@r<ZQP>w* 'ay*e<TIP>h d*AgA<MUN>n wAyA<ATN>yin b*@hi<SIL>t@`aT*@pA<MEH>m k*E<SIL>xAlAl<PAS> b*ir@xob<MUN>w^ot `i<ZQP>yr b*@hiS@t*ap*e<MUN>k@ nap@SA<ZQP>m 'El=xe<TIP>yq 'im*otA<SIL>m:

mA<SIL>h='<HPA>`iyde<GAR>k@ mA<MUN>h '<HPA>dam*Eh=l*A<RBM>k@ hab*at<PAS> y@r<MUN>w*SAla<ZQP>im mA<MEH>h 'aS@wEh=l*Ak@<PAS> wa'<HPA>na<SIL>x<HPA>me<ZQP>k@ b*@tw*la<TIP>t b*at=Yiy*<ATN>w^on k*i<SIL>y=gAd<MER>w^ol k*ay*A<TEB>m Sib@re<TIP>k@ mi<MER>y yir@p*A'=lA<SIL>k@:

n@biy'a<RBM>yik@ xA<MEH>zw* lAk@<PAS> SA<MUN>w@' w@tApe<ZQP>l w@lo<SIL>'=gil*<MER>w* `al=`<HPA>w͏one<TIP>k@ l@hASi<MUN>yb W/bytk (S@bw*te<ATN>k@) way*E<MUN>x<HSE>zw* lA<ZQP>k@ maW@'<MER>w^ot SA<TIP>w@' w*mad*w*xi<SIL>ym:

sA<SIL>p@q<AZL>w* `Ala<MEH>yik@ k*ap*a<AZL>yim<PAS> k*Al=`o<MUN>b@rey dE<ZQP>rEk@ SA<SIL>r@qw*<PAS> way*Ani<MUN>`w* ro'SA<ZQP>m `al=b*a<TIP>t y@r<SIL>w*SAlA<ATN>im h<HPA>zo<MUN>'t hA`i<RBM>yr SEy*o<SIL>'m@rw*<PAS> k*@li<MUN>ylat yo<ZQP>piy mAW<TIP>w^oW l@kAl=hA'A<SIL>rEY:

p*AY<AZL>w* `Ala<MEH>yik@ p*iyhEm<PAS> k*Al='o<MUN>y@ba<ZQP>yik@ SA<SIL>r@qw*<PAS> way*a<SIL>xar@qw*=Se<ZQP>n 'A<SIL>m@r<TIP>w* b*il*A<ATN>`@nw* 'a<MUN>k@ zE<MER>h hay*<TEB>w^om SEq*iw*iynu<TIP>hw* mAYA<MER>'nw* rA'i<SIL>ynw*:

`AWA<AZL>h y@hwA<GER>h '<HPA>SE<MUN>r zAmA<RBM>m b*iY*a<MEH>` 'Em@rAtw^o<PAS> '<HPA>SE<MUN>r Yiw*A<MUN>h mi<SIL>ymey=qE<ZQP>dEm hAra<TIP>s w@lo<MUN>' xAmA<ATN>l way@Wam*a<MEH>x `Ala<AZL>yik@<PAS> 'w^oye<ZQP>b heri<TIP>ym qE<MER>rEn YArA<SIL>yik@:

YA`a<MER>q lib*A<TIP>m 'El='<HPA>donA<ATN>y xw^oma<MUN>t b*at=Yi<TLM>y*w^on hw^ori<AZL>ydiy kan*a<MEH>xal d*im@`Ah<PAS> yw^omA<MUN>m wAla<ZQP>y@lAh 'a<SIL>l=t*it*@ni<MEH>y pw*gat<PAS> lA<ZQP>k@ 'al=t*id*o<TIP>m b*at=`eyne<SIL>k@:

q<MUN>w*miy | ro<MUN>n*iy blyl (bal*a<RBM>y@lAh) l@ro'S<PAS> 'aS@mur<ZQP>w^ot Sip@ki<MEH>y kam*a<AZL>yim<PAS> lib*e<ZQP>k@ no<TIP>kax p*@ne<MUN>y '<HPA>donA<ATN>y W@'i<DAR>y 'elA<MUN>yw k*ap*a<RBM>yik@ `al=nE<AZL>pES<PAS> `<SIL>w^olAla<ZQP>yik@ hA<SIL>`<HPA>Tw*pi<MER>ym b*@rA`A<TIP>b b*@ro<MER>'S k*Al=xw*Y<SIL>w^ot:

r@'e<MEH>h y@hwAh<PAS> w@<SIL>hab*i<ZQP>yTAh l@mi<TIP>y `w^ola<MUN>l@t*A k*o<ATN>h 'im=t*o'ka<AZL>l@nAh nASi<MEH>ym p*ir@yAm<PAS> `o<SIL>l@le<MUN>y Tip*uxi<ZQP>ym 'im=ye<SIL>hAre<TEB>g b*@miq@d*a<MER>S '<HPA>donA<TIP>y k*ohe<MER>n w@nAbi<SIL>y':

SA<SIL>k@b<AZL>w* lA'A<MEH>rEY xw*Yw^ot<PAS> na<MUN>`ar w@zAqe<ZQP>n b*@t<SIL>w*lota<MER>y w*ba<SIL>xw*ra<TIP>y nA<SIL>p@l<MUN>w* bExA<ATN>rEb hAra<AZL>g@t*A<PAS> b*@y<MUN>w^om 'ap*E<ZQP>kA TAba<TIP>x@t*A lo<MER>' xAmA<SIL>l@t*A:

t*iq@rA'<TLP> k@y<AZL>w^om mw^o`e<MEH>d m@gw*ray<PAS> mis*Abi<ZQP>yb w@lo<MER>' hAyA<TEB>h b*@y<MER>w^om 'ap=y@hwA<TIP>h p*Ali<MUN>yT w@WAri<ATN>yd '<HPA>SEr=Tip*a<MER>x@t*iy w@rib*i<TIP>ytiy 'o<SIL>y@bi<MER>y kil*A<SIL>m:
'<HPA>ni<MEH>y hag*E<AZL>bEr<PAS> rA'A<MUN>h `<HQA>ni<ZQP>y b*@Se<TIP>bET `Eb@rAt<SIL>w^o:
'w^oti<MER>y nAha<TEB>g way*ola<TIP>k@ xo<MER>SEk@ w@lo'='<SIL>w^or:
'a<MUN>k@ b*i<MER>y yASu<TEB>b ya<SIL>h<HPA>po<MER>k@ yAd<TIP>w^o k*Al=hay*<SIL>w^om:
b*il*A<MEH>h b@WAriy<PAS> w@`w^ori<ZQP>y Sib*a<TIP>r `aY@mw^otA<SIL>y:
b*AnA<MER>h `Ala<TEB>y way*aq*a<TIP>p ro<MER>'S w*t@lA'A<SIL>h:
b*@ma<SIL>x<HPA>Sak*i<MER>ym h<SIL>w^oSiyba<TIP>niy k*@mete<MER>y `w^olA<SIL>m:
g*Ada<DAR>r b*a<SIL>`<HPA>di<TEB>y w@lo<MER>' 'eYe<TIP>' hik@b*i<MER>yd n@xAS@t*i<SIL>y:
g*a<MUN>m k*i<MEH>y 'Ez@`aq<PAS> wa<SIL>'<HPA>Saw*e<ZQP>`a WAta<TIP>m t*@pil*Ati<SIL>y:
g*Ada<MEH>r d*@rAkay<PAS> b*@gAzi<ZQP>yt n@ti<SIL>ybota<TIP>y `iw*A<SIL>h:
